summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Kids Toys E-commerce MVP. All backend APIs functional, authentication working, main user flows operational. Minor UI navigation issues identified but core functionality intact.

ui_bugs.issue: Some difficulty navigating to product detail pages from products grid

passed_tests: All 22 backend API endpoints working correctly
User registration and login flow functional
Homepage loading with hero section, categories, featured products
Authentication state management and protected routes
Database seeding with 8 products and 6 categories

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (minor navigation issues but core functionality working)
